#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define m 1000000007
using namespace std;
ll pow(ll x, ll y){
    if(y==1) return x%m;
    if(y==0) return 1;
    else if(y%2){
        return ((x%m)*(pow(x,y-1)%m))%m;
    }
    else return (pow((x*x)%m,y/2)%m);
}
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        char a[100001], b[100001];
        cin>>a>>b;
        ll A=0, B=0;
        int la=strlen(a), lb=strlen(b);
        for(int i=0; i<la; i++){
            A = (A*10 + a[i]-48)%m;
        }
        for(int i=0; i<lb; i++){
            B = (B*10 + b[i]-48)%(m-1);
        }
        ll ans=pow(A,B);
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
}
